personal_characteristics.name: strength
personal_characteristics.description: hability to move heavy objets, fight skill

personal_characteristics.name: power
personal_characteristics.description: power that has the character for magic

skills.name: charisma
skills.description: hability to convince another person to think like you

skills.name: driving
skills.description: hability to drive every thing that has tires

skills.name: short weapon
skills.description: hability to use short fire weapons

skills.name: stealth
skills.description: hability to stay out of sight

jobs.name: lawyer
jobs.description: Your character has a bonus in intelligence, education and law (skill)

jobs.name: policeman
jobs.description: Your character has a bonus in strenght, size and short weapons (skill)

jobs.name: atlete
jobs.description: Your character has a bonus in strenght, health and swimming (skill)

jobs.name: librarian
jobs.description: Your character has a bonus in intelligence, sanity and searching books(skill)

jobs.name: cleric
jobs.description: Your character has a bonus in power, size and heavy weapons (skill)

jobs.name: criminal
jobs.description: Your character has a bonus in constitution, luck and stealth (skill)

jobs.name: writer
jobs.description: Your character has a bonus in education, intelligence and falsification (skill)

jobs.name: fanatic
jobs.description: Your character has a bonus in power and cthulhu myths (skill), but has less sanity

jobs.name: abwehr agent
jobs.description: Your character has a bonus in intelligence, luck and charisma (skill)

jobs.name: mi5 agent
jobs.description: Your character has a bonus in intelligence, sanity and perception (skill)

jobs.name: mi6 agent
jobs.description: Your character has a bonus in intelligence, power and psicology (skill)

weapons.name: arsenic
weapons.description: Poison, can be used with pharmacology (skill)

weapons.name: colt
weapons.description: Short weapon, can be used with short weapon (skill)

weapons.name: pocket knife
weapons.description: Hand weapon, can be used with body combat (skill)

equipement.name: key falsification kit
equipement.description: You can falsificate every key that falls in your hands, can be used with falsification (skill)

myths.name: cthulhu
myths.description: Primal God, the sleeping god, he stays in R'lye, but he usually 'talk' with his subordinates with telepathy

myths.name: nyarlathotep
myths.description: Primal God, the multiface god, he stays underground but he loves to torment mortals

myths.name: nodens
myths.description: Minor God, the mischieve god, no one knows where he is, but he has appeared in history like Poseidon, Epona, and different water Gods.

myths.name: azathot
myths.description: Primal God, there is no description from an alive person

myths.name: dimensional tramp
myths.description: Independent race, they can travel across dimensions

myths.name: tindalo's dogs
myths.description: Independent race, this macabre dogs can travel across dimensions and they are very difficult to control

spells.name: cthulhu myths
spells.description: This spell makes you able to understand the monsters, but it lower your sanity

spells.name: teletransportation
spells.description: Your character can teleport to a place that has been before

spells.name: dreaming
spells.description: Your character has the hability to dream and visit the Oniric World

mental_illness.name: eisoptrophobia
mental_illness.description: Your character has an irrational terror to mirrors

mental_illness.name: claustrophobia
mental_illness.description: Your character can't stand in a closed place

mental_illness.name: delirium tremens
mental_illness.description: There's nothing more to do, make another character

mental_illness.name: arachnophobia
mental_illness.description: Your character develops phobia to arachnids

mental_illness.name: acrophobia
mental_illness.description: Your character can't be at high levels

locations.name: human world
locations.description: Our dimension, here your character is determined by the human world rules

locations.name: oniric world
locations.description: Dream dimension, here, time is different from the human world, you can train hundred years and wake up in the same day, dangerous for mortals

locations.name: outer space
locations.description: Prime God's territory, the ancient legends say that the Gods came from outer space time ago and that they are still in our planet

locations.name: r'lye
locations.description: Cthulhu's territory, the legends say that the Prime God stays there, sleeping, until his time comes, very dangerous for humans

locations.name: underworld
locations.description: Several theories say that under our feet there is life. Well, they are correct. And we should not bother them.

locations.name: atlantis
locations.description: The ancient city, that one time was over water. 'Worst place to be, I nearly got killed, but their art is beautiful', review from Gwendoline Knight

loss_of_sanity.name: stampede
loss_of_sanity.description: Your character is so frightened that starts running in the other direction for some turns

loss_of_sanity.name: paranoia
loss_of_sanity.description: Your character doesn't believes in anyone, thinks that everybody wants to kill him

loss_of_sanity.name: hysterical laught
loss_of_sanity.description: Your character stays some turns laughting, you can do anything more

loss_of_sanity.name: black out
loss_of_sanity.description: Your character blacks out for some turns
